mapper.select: select * from (select bb.*,aa.id,aa.name,cc.cnt,rownum rnum from member aa,(select * from fan where bj_num=#{bj_num})bb, (select dd.m_num,sum(ee.use_ea) cnt from (select m_num from fan where bj_num=#{bj_num})dd,use ee where dd.m_num=ee.m_num group by dd.m_num)cc where aa.m_num = bb.m_num and aa.m_num = cc.m_num) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select NVL(count(m_num),0) cnt from (select dd.m_num,sum(ee.use_ea) cnt from (select m_num from fan where bj_num=#{bj_num})dd,use ee where dd.m_num=ee.m_num group by dd.m_num)
